concept.title: Sametime server configuration files
concept.shortdesc: There are a number of configuration files on the Sametime server that a backup copy should be retained after the server configuration is complete.

row.entry: The HCL Notes database that is accessed using the HCL Notes or Administrator client.

Created when the Sametime server is started and based on values in the custom.env or values.yaml files.
This file is a sectioned configuration file. The sections are noted in square brackets, for example [Config]. Settings must be located in the correct section, otherwise they do not take effect.
Considerations:
Do not duplicate section names or parameters.
Do not use illegal XML characters.
This file is used to configure persistent chat logging.
This file is used to configure, tune and secure the Domino server that is utilized by the Sametime Community server.
